Absolute banger! I love this stuff and cant understand why I waited so much to get that big fat 180 ml bottle of the best leather on the market! It has some tipical ADP dry citruses in the backgroud, yet some soft fruity playfulness, little chocolatery and a loooot of leather! Different from Tom Ford leathers and suits any time and season.
Really adore this perfume, 10/10 for me! :)

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
This fragrance is sooooooooo bad!
I'm a fully-fledged fragrance head; my top fragrances are CK Euphoria Amber Gold, Fahrenheit, Terre D'Hermes, Dior Homme Intense, Sauvage EDP, Chanel Allure Homme Sport, and Paco Rabanne Invictus...

I only bought this because it was so heavily discounted... but there's a reason why it was so heavily discounted; this is trash juice!!
I'd often wondered why there weren't many reviews on YouTube regarding this fragrance. It's because nobody wants it, due to it being an unpleasant mess. One that has absolutely no business being a "fragrance".
The day before my blind-buy was due to arrive, I was agonising over whether to keep it or cancel it before it was due to arrive. I opted to decline it at the door, by refusing delivery. The delivery lady expressed that that'd be a lot of work for her, so not wanting to inconvenience her, I kept it. BIG MISTAKE!!! I took a chance and failed, BIGTIME!!!
I rushed in, opened it, was impressed by the presentation, OF COURSE; It's Aqua Di Parma!
Then I sprayed it... my face scrunched up, and I was gutted, because I'd just wasted £100 on this mess, that is now unreturnable because I'd opened it. Yuck!
It smells like the leather interior of a new luxury car, with an antiseptic smell to boot...
Who in hell wants to smell like this!? Not me; I'm only 38 years old!! This stuff is old man. Not even a fashionable old man, an old man who has no clue about fashion or what works... Yuuuuuuuuuuck!!
My older lady-friend came over. She's so polite about everything, but she couldn't even hide her displeasure about how bad this smells; she scrunched up her face and shook her head, but said nothing...
Then I pushed her... "go on, what's up???" She responded, "you smell like you've been to the dentist... this is not nice... this has to be your worst fragrance..."
One review I read, said that it also has a first aid box smell. I concur with that statement; it's horrible stuff! I regret this, enormously!
I put it on Ebay for £61. People are currently bidding on it; I'll take a loss on this, I just want it GONE!!😖😨😰🤢🤮
Just offloaded this trash, toilet water fragrance! Hallelujah😃👏🏾👏🏾👏🏾

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: This is so much better than Tuscan Leather – the Tom Ford is for me a bold leather fragrance – exactly as if you were in a leather shop, I don’t want to smell like a leather shop – this ADP is more sophisticated, more wearable for the skin, a little more sexy also a little more oriental in a positive way, unfortunately discontinued but still very affordable – if you buy yourself a bottle of 180ml. lasts a really long time

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
Smooth, expensive, friendly, pleasant, refined leather with a hint of rose. Like the very best leather bags from Hermes. Not a biker dirty funky leather. I'm not really a leather fragrance guy but I could get into this. Nothing sweet.

Scent: 8.5 / Sillage: 8 / Longevity: 8

EDIT: My old notes at the beginning of my frag journey...I guess I didn't like leather back then
1st wear: Very leathery. Smoke & Wood. Bit Sharp.
2nd wear: Dry & leathery. Nice but not me? 7-8/10.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
Citrusy woody leather.
I love this one. A little complicated.
It smells like a luxury classic car leather seat.
Nice and gentle.
I prefer the dry down.its a better version of Tuscan Leather by TF specially in dry down.
Longevity is very good and projection is fair.
4/5
Age:+30
Preferably for cool autumn evenings and nights.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
When i first sprayed this i didn't know what exactly it smells like! but when i placed the blotter on my desk and forgot about it, after around 12 hours from spraying it on the blotter i begun detecting whiffs of "Tuscany Leather" by Tom Ford and i didn't know which blotter is giving me this smell till i sniffed this one!

I believe this is more like the "Cuoio Nobile" by Pineider rather than Tom Ford's version, cause actually Tom's version gives me REAL headache with its overpowered projection.

"Colonia Leather" is quite nice actually and i do recommend it to those who enjoys leathery safe blends as i've meet allot of guys who don't much like fragrances but adores this & they see it expensive but worth it, AND i don't recommend it to those who seeks something different, harsh leather, or very rough concept of leather. Nice.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: Amazing, sophisticated, sophisticated, just class. For me it is the best leather scent.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
Superb, I have owned TL and Ombre Leather neither are as good as this. Excellent from opening to fair drydown.

10/10

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: I own a bottle of this good fragrance that hums on mid-range vibrations - neither too fresh nor too dark. Made in 2018. I also own some AXE sprays in this ballpark, with gaudier attractions. One being Skateboards & Fresh Roses.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: What about special edition?the same juice????

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: Combining fresh citrus notes with rich and sensual aromatic leather, Colonia Leather is Italian luxury at it’s finest. It’s masculine yet elegant and particularly stylish. Just take a look at these fragrance notes and tell me that doesn’t sound phenomenal; Sicilian Lemon, Italian Orange, Raspberry, Honeysuckle, Petit Grain, Rose, Leather, Cedarwood, Birchwood, Gaiac Wood, Labdaum.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
Fragrantica has the notes for this fragrance wrong. Theyve pasted the note listing from the Black Bottle version on this Colonia Concentree version. They used to have the correct notes listed before they switched to this new website format. The notes in the actual description are the original/correct notes for this Colonia Concentree version.

"Top notes of Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée provide luminous scents of Brazilian orange combined with Sicilian lime. The heart adds rose and petit grain from Paraguay followed by leather, Atlas cedar and guaiac wood from Paraguay"

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: Really love this one, great scent and good performance!

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
The Acqua di Parma Colonia Leather Concentrée is beautiful. Along with Tom Ford's Ombre Leather this is one of the best leather fragrances you will have the pleasure of wearing.

As mentioned below in several other reviews it does smell like shoe polish, but the most luxurious shoe polish you will ever smell. It is linear, and that is not a bad thing at all. It's how I would prefer a scent like this one to be. Not much projection; I feel it stays close.

As for longevity, goodness me, I got way over 15 hours with three sprays yesterday. And even after I showered I still got whiffs of it while snuggling up in bed.

Acqua di Parma Colonia Leather Concentrée is classy, it is an elegant scent. If you like leather fragrances I suggest you get both the Acqua di Parma and the Tom Ford. You will not be disappointed.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
Ultra feminine, sweet, soft, commercial leather of the sort you'd find in stores that sell commercial leather products - jackets, wallets, belts and ladies' handbags.

It could potentially smell as a car leather seat, in a brand new, factory-fresh car.

The opening is absolutely horrendous - it smells like shoe polish.
The drydown smells like commercial leather products or brand new leather car seats I was referring to.

Suitable for evening and night, fall and winter.
Definitely not a man's fragrance. I'd say this is more suitable for ladies.
On a woman, this would probably smell divine.
Unfortunately, not something I'd wear.

Final score: 5/10.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: This smells like leather seat of a new car and car is for men and women so this one leans unisex IMO. Those who like leather accords will probably take this as a masterpiece.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: Best leather fragrances for men I have tested so far.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: One of the best smelling classy leather fragrance for me, however La Yuqawan wins over for it's cheap price specially here the ME region but never the same quality as ADP.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: @IAmStaka Once the juice has matured in the bottle it, the leather note, gets actually very heavy. Fresh leather you could call Atelier Cologne Camelia Intrepide for example. Rasasi can't compare with the quality of Acqua di Parma!

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
LEATHER does not belong in fresh & clean fragrances, change my mind.
You can call it a fresher take, I call it watered down Rasasi La Yuqawam/TF Tuscan Leather. It's okay....

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
batch 3348Y

i ain't never bin at the bottom of no ladies' handbag so's i cain't tell if this here adp leather o di cologna concetrate smells like that. but i ken tell ya that it smells a lot like that old leather pouch ahangin' in the shed.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
I purchased a sample and immediately hated it, I asked a few friends to try it and they agreed. Horrible. I left it in a drawer for a few months and then, one day, when i got a bit of a whiff from some old trainers I had just taken off after a long day. I thought to myself that I would use the sample to spray in my trainers in an attempt to remove the whiff. Before i did, I had a sniff of the sample bottle and didn't hate it it. Hmmm ........

Edit: Now I'm thinking about buying it..........

So I bought it....OMFG I love it......just sayin

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
Review based on the tester 2408Y. This is so good.

You need to have the proper inner confidence to wear this. Its bold and give the message to the world: " You will not mess with me". I don't suggest blind buying this at all, it's quite specific but if you are into leather stuff this is perfect!

For me, this is 9/10 as I love leather fragrances.

The soundtrack of this fragrance - Get It On (Bang a Gong)!

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: Love from the first sniff.Pure laether with fruityness,very masculine...simply stunning.I can not wait to put it on,and wear it for a couple of cold days.A must have for leather lovers and great musculine scents.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: A leather fragrance made all' italiana.It is a fresh take on leather.Smells divine and stays with you for quite a while.A keeper

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
On my skin, like a bolder Oud. Citrus veiled in wood smoke, with some leather. Masculine and refined. Smells change over time: a barber shop smell briefly appeared after a couple hours, then woody leather. Sweet floral notes come and go. A cycle of aromas; a mood ring for the olfactory sense.
I love this and Tom Ford Tuscan in different ways. This one's for your better behaved days

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
This is THE leather scent for me, I tried it 5 years ago in a shop, tried it a year later and still I liked it.
I always thought it was to expensive for me and caved for the la yuqawam scent. That however has the prominent raspberry note. It's good but the raspberry is too much, here you get that tone too at the beginning but quickly it fades for a more citrusy and more real leather scent. When drying down you get the real leather with rose to get a very classy feel.

The Yuqawam stays raspberry and because of that more ashtray on me, I discovered that I realy hate the raspberry note if it's too much, it's also the reason that I gave my bottle of Rochas man away after a few wearings. The Yuqawam is only good for wearing outside for me because the raspberry gets overwhelming.

Now I got a good deal for around 110 euros for a 180 ml bottle of colonia leather so I could not resist it anymore.
The presentation, the massive 180 ml bottle and the scent give it a real sense of class.

The only leather that's close to beeing as good as this one, for me, would be Tom Ford's ombre leather.

10/10

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: safe and beautiful male fragrance

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: It's magnificent! The beginning is citruses, bright, but not too strong or refreshing. Almost immediately after you could smell very realistic luxury leather. In the dry down the rose and a bit of white flowers start to be more prominent, but leather stays till the very end. It is very refined, a bit shy but elegant, though people might find this sort of leather a bit too brutal and animalic. I see that people are change their opinions after wearing it for a bit longer, or being with a person who wears it constantly. I find AdP Leather very original but I see a person who might wear it as his/her signature. Longevity and sillage are above average. Not sure about blind buying, probably more no, than yes.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
Wow!Amazing!
This one is on another level,it definitely has a class to it .On my skin the rose and the leather notes are very prominent and I absolutely love it!
Imagine wearing this on a special occassion along with a black suit,such a great pairing!
A very seductive and confident scent 😉

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
Simply AMAZING !!!

This perfume is high class, luxurious, sophisticated, & extraordinary. it's an opulent leather scent, very smooth & elegant. The longevity & projection is immense. if you are a leather fan surely you don't want to miss this one. in fact, for any perfume enthusiast, this fragrance should be in your collection & you won't regret it.

It's 9.5 out of 10 for me

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: A very vegetal smelling leather fragrance with some citruses & woods. I smell no sweetness in this that would make it truly comparable to TL or OL. I'll give it an 8/10

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
Name is bit misleading,although it has leather which is similar(not same)to TF TL but the perfume has lot more character to it. loved the floral touch.
good longevity and silage.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
This is a very unique scent. I like it.
To me it somewhat reminds me of the bottom of the inside of a women’s purse. Leather, gum, makeup.. It’s not a bad scent.
A little of this stuff goes a long way.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
Last Saturday I sprayed it after shower at 19.00.
My son stopped by late and slept in my office where I keep my fragrances.
So I got up next morning and could not reach for a new fragrances as usual.
At around 14.00 I realized I was still wearing ADP Leather. And it was still active. A bit faint but not even skin scent after 19 hours.
I sprayed Shay & Blue Blacks Club Leather on top.

Not the sweetest leather I have but for sure the best performer.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: Worse perfume ever! No joke it made throw up. That never happend before. Oud by aqua I parma much better!!

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
one of my top 5 perfumes in my collection ... if you ask me what is the best leather fragrance in market i will tell you directly of course Acqua Di Parma Leather

it's a hidden leather note scent , the leather here is not offensive as other fragrances it'e very well blended

Rich, warm, Woody, multifaceted , deep but with a rose touch

longevity here is great i got easily 9 hours and great projection & sillage for first 3 hours

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
The scent of haute couture, a leatherworker's busy atelier, or a designer boutique riddled with handbags too expensive to even glance at. Superbly smooth and wearable – a delicate, realistic accord that's less jarring than the typical one-spray headache leather fragrance.
As a man, I'd fall in love with a woman who smells like this. I can only hope that it works the other way around. Moderate projection and great longevity.

Spotlight, performed by Jessie Ware

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
Perfection! Scent, intensity, projection and duration.

Probably unisex... definately unisex, because I would die if a woman passes by next to me wearing this.

My hat to the perfumer.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
Holy SH## this one is surprisingly good! Nice fresh top note, I can get an entire orange tree vibe. Woodyness, green notes, earthiness, citrus, and the zestyness. Like when you get the entire plant out of the soil, and put it in a bottle of perfume from the roots to the very top.

Than it comes to the crisp leather scent with the strong cedar. Top class perfumery right there, and it gets me a solid 8 hours anytime with its EDC concentration.

Top Note: 9/10
Drydown: 9/10
Performance: 9/10
Presentation: 10/10
Versatiltiy: 7/10

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
Is this fragrance has been reformulated and watered down?

I bought the 180ml bottle but the citrus is toned down, is less fresh and the projection seems to low compared to the mini sample i've tested 2years ago from Nose Paris!


Maybe not remember well?
Maybe Nose send me a mislabel sample?
Who knows!

Batch Number:: 3128Y

I regret the 180€ i paid for!

From this genre,Dueto Golden Boy still my favorite!

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: Its by far the best and most wearable leather scent in my opinion , the leather note smells so authentic like a real leather , you still cant spray too much of it like every leather perfume or you will get headache , if you are willing to buy a niche quality leather scent then this one can be your best choice .

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
Blind buy. Smells similar to TFTL (not as harsh) and PDM Godolphin. Opens with smokey leather tar and dries to fruity berry rose (I don't get as much citrus). To say this smells just like a leather store is an exaggeration. I wish it didn't dry down to fruity rose because it makes it too feminine (and too derivative). However, the rose seems to be blended better than most, it is noticeable, but not sickening. Overall: FRUITY LEATHER, LIKE (not love), COOLER WEATHER, SEMI DRESSY, SLIGHTLY UNISEX/FEMININE (on dry down), POTENT.

Update 10.6.20 I underestimated the ADP DNA of this fragrance (citrus, clean soap) which for me, doesn't appear until the 2nd day of wear! It is definitely unique in its develop over the hours. For me, longevity is pretty amazing. I reserve this scent for more special occasions in FALL/WINTER.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: gue suka banget ini. aslii. vote di fragrantica beneran akurat. personal score 8/10

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: To my nose this is what Fahrenheit should have smelled like. While Fahrenheit comes across as one-dimensional with a single note that lingers on and on, this one is richer, deeper, more refined, and more interesting. It also smells like an upgraded GIT. In that it's a more modern, more successful, and more expressively mature scent than the two afore-mentioned.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
- Sexy charming sharp Italian Gentleman's magic bottle!

One of my top favorite / A niche quality Scent ****

Ingredient Structure:

- Head: Brazilian Orange, Lime
- Body: Petitgrain Paraguay, Rose
- Base: Leather, Guaiac Wood, Cedar

If you are into Leather scents, appreciate sophistication elegance luxury and can afford the price, then this is a must-have for you! But do not blind buy, this is an strong opinionated scent, you would either love or hate it :) just like TF Tuscon Leather fans camps!

I am personally not pro citrus DNA/opening makes, but if you know Acqua Di Parma DNA, you should be able to admire the formula in introducing a well-presentation citrus opening which it further launch the pleasant civilized smoky leather with a base with a woody green cedar landing which is not so prolonged.

My only expectation for this category and price would have been a better projection and longevity over 4 hours on my skin (which it might vary on other skin types ;) )

So, my final grade:

- Scent: 9.5/10
- Silage: 9/10
- Projection: 9/10
- Longevity: 8.5/10

Total 9/10 **** Among Top 5 Leather Notes!

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
Very good blended leather fragrance. Everything in the composition work in order to intensify that leather note. This is kinda awesome, since the leather in this concoction is amazing. Its invigorating, raw, and potent.

There is a hint of freshness in the opening, though this only lasts for minutes. The oud note in the background is detectable; but its only there to support the leather.

Of course, this being a leather note, it gets compared to other leather offerings from Tom Ford (Tuscan leather / Ombre leather). From the designer Realm, Gucci guilty absolute comes close to this.

Performance is excellent. Sillage is classy and not at all offensive, even if over sprayed.

Its easy to wear; and awesome to smell.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: A whiff of orange in the opening, then straight to the heart of pure leather. A few notes of rose in there too to smooth it out and make it a little more elegant. Love it

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
Scent: 9/10

Quality: 10/10

Originality: 6/10

Sillage: 8/10

Projection: 7/10

Longevity: 8/10

Price VS Size: 8/10

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
Pure leather. Incandescent, it is like fuel but of a type you smell with astonishment. It reminds me of a purse that my grandmother had. We have excellent persistence, excellent fragrance, excellent memories. What more could you ask for?
I smile at 32 teeth!

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: this is such a great leather fragrance, it isn't too overwhelming like the other ones in this category. leather note leans toward a dry scent. also the opening is fresh and citrusy. all in all this is a great one for anybody who loves leather and would recommend it highly.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
Blind bought it and when I first smelled it I was like wow. I've smelled tuscan leather before and don't get me wrong, it's good but this is so much smoother and better in my opinion. it doesn't hurt that it's cheaper too...


9.5/10

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: Smoother and fresher version of Tuscan Leather and Godolphin type of scent. One of the best leather I know.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: Smells like the inside of a brand new vehicle with leather seats... LITERALLY.... I can’t get over it lmao not a stinky, dark leather at all, it’s a very clean smelling leather... wasn’t expecting that, thought it would be more like TL with the stinky smoky leather smell but not at all... VERY clean smell, I would def categorize this as a fresh fragrance... the citrus in this really gives it that clean smell and like I said the leather is like smelling a brand new interior

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
Leather, citrus and some rose. Mostly leather and citrus. That's what I get. Well blended but not too complex.

Good performance. 8 hours longevity, good projection for a couple hours, but people in your vicinity should be able to pick it up the entire 8 hours.

It's a very good scent. Versatile, but not versatile. It's a leather I can see being worn year round. The problem is I don't think it's casual. I can only see myself wearing this with a suit.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: salty and cosy

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: Leather. That’s it. Sometimes the opening does have the animalistic note mentioned in other reviews, perhaps like hay from a horses stall. Very long-lasting, especially on clothes, like many others from this line, so plan to launder or only wear this fragrance with those clothes. Definite similarities with other leather scents such as TFTL and La Yuqawam. Not really something you can wear everywhere and all the time. It does attract comments very frequently, not necessarily bland comments, be warned. The 180ml bottle looks impressive and comes in a nice box. I’m currently just cycling through AdP Leather, Mirra, Oud and Sandalo, with the odd splash of Declaration Parfum thrown in. Nothing else needed.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
to me only leather note is same rest everything is different .

doesn't upset my tummy .

only 2 leather frags that i can wear TL and this .

Pricey !!

8/10 for me

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: This cologne is very masculine. It is similar to Tom Ford Tuscan leather, but hear me out. This is much less sweet than Tuscan leather and that is exactly why this is a perfect scent for a man. First forget about the Twinkies claiming the right or wrong season to wear this colonge. If you are man enough, you can wear this juice any time you feel like it. Own it. It's what real men do.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
Sweet leather , more like new leather than old/used, probably for the orange top note. If I had to synthesize the global impression of the scent: it reminds me of sweet RUM... Differently from other reviewers I don’t see much evolution from the beginning and later on, just after about 5 hours the orange note becomes lighter. It is really potent with a very good longevity: may be 2 sprays are enough not to be overwhelmed by this perfume at least for the first 5 hours when the citrusy notes are intense.
I like it!

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
Beautifully made leather fragrance. Bold, in the same league as Colonia Oud.
At this price point, one has to make decision, I opt for Colonia Oud. That said, Colonia Leather is a close 2nd.

Edit: I have both on my skin now. The leather is indeed similar to Tom Ford Tuscan Leather, but rounder and without the rasperry note. (I prefer AdP's over TF's). That said, there is rose showing up in the drydown, that brings it back towards the TL path.
The reason I opt for the Colonia Oud is that the drydown is similar to Colonia Leather, but without sweetness.
In summary: for me, Colonia Leather wins in the opening, and Colonia Oud in the drydown.

Edit 2: I have to edit completely my comment. Colonia Leather has a beautiful opening, that is a fresh, then shortly after, a bolder woody leather. Really great. The guaiac wood then leaves the stage to let the rose take over the supporting role, and that results in the drydown being a carbon copy of TF Tuscan Leather. Not really for my taste, and a little too "in your face" to be elegant.
Of AdP's Oud-Ambra-Leather trio, leather is probably the one that has the strongest projection, with a heavy projection in the first hour, followed by moderate in the following 2-3 hours, and softer projection for another 1-2 hours after that. That said, of these 3, it's the one who has the shortest longevity (approx. 8 hours), but still more than enough for what is needed for a long evening.
As for my preferences, I have to say that Ambra is now on top of the podium, with Oud as a close 2nd.
Unfortunately the similarity with TF's TL makes it a no-go for me, but for those who liked TL, it's a must! (better than TL imo).

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
This is not just another version of TL, in fact it is quite unlike any of the typical "raspberry leather" that I have tried to date which are TL, Ombre 18, Oud Saphir and La Yuquwam.
It is also not like Gucci Guilty Absolute, which is different than those styles also.

All these frags do seemingly have birch tar as their main leather note but that is the only thing in common with this really.

What this fragrance is about is smoothness. It is smooth and superbly blended, from top to bottom and because of that rather than leather it reminds me of an expensive suede.

It starts off with a very smooth creamy orange, with that same tarry leather note from TL/Ombre and the like underneath but far less pronounced. As it dries down the leather comes through more and some green notes too to finally leave a really well balanced orange leather and wood scent to enjoy.
It doesn’t project as heavy as the typical raspberry ones and feels more sophisticated and versatile for it.

This one is for the times you want to wear TL, but the situation needs a bit more class and elegant restraint. It projects but it is not a beast, it lasts but not forever and it is unique in its own right.


Of this line Colonia Oud is my favorite scent wise, but this is more wearable and so will be reached for more often.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
Tuscan Leather..???....IMHO...NO!

With this one..."what you see,is what you get".

Citrus....paired with leather...cedar...woods. ...small puff of Rose........

Simple...straight-forward...magnificent.

Tested from a spray sample.

Damn, I want a full bottle..A-SAP !!!

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: Nothing makes me happier than a fragrance that delivers. In this case I'd say acqua di parma colonia leather eau de cologne concentree over-delivered. First I want a leather fragrance to be a leather fragrance; that means, it makes me think of a certain type of leather. I also want it to be bold and luxurious. If I want any leather upholstery or jacket, I want it to be authentic and well made; and same will apply to my fragrances. I don't want a "pleather", I want the real deal. Of course being a fragrance, a nice blend of other notes to enrich the main note is allowed, but not overpowering or taking anything way from the main note. If the leather is aggressive or smooth I wouldn't mind either, as long as it is quality with excellent performance. Thats what you'll get with colonia leather; rose, bergamot, petigrain, orange, guaiac wood, and cedar, all blended together...well!

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
Warm, masculine, dark, that's how I'd describe this lovely fragrance. Imagine Tobacco Vanille, but intead of the vanilla, substitute Leather/Oud, that's what the essence is of this scent.
Longevity is slightly above average, and silage is decent within the first hour. Overall, it's a worthy addition this House, whilst also remaining true to the classic notes which have made it famous.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
This leather is very challenging. I used to live on a country side and smell of horses and stables is well known to my nose. And this fragrance smells like horses and stables. It does not have to be a bad thing, if you choose the right situation for wearing it, but I just can not imagine wearing it on business meeting. Even if I were CEO, just no.

Respect, but pass for me. And I would not compare it to tuscan leather. That one does not have that strong animalic note.

Scent: 4/10
Performance: 8/10
Versatility: 2/10

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: I find it too masculine for me, and would like to mix it with another to make it more feminine. What do you recommend?

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: This and Tuscan leather are twin brothers.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: Great, raunchy leather, smooth and rough at the same time, well blended ..one hell of a wallop!

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: Remember all of those other leather scents; Tom Ford Tuscan Leather, Ombre Leather, Charriol Royal Leather etc. Go buy them. I want this one all to myself. The best leather fragrance IMO. Rich fresh full notes. I never struggle to detect them. Fresh uplifting and very well blend. I got mine.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: واقعا اونچه از رایحه چرم انتظار داشتم از آب در اومده.عطر چرمی سیتروسی از مرکز مرکبات، ایتالیا.تقابل چرم و با لایه ای از رز.شاهکار پرفورمنسه این ادوکلن(با توجه به میزان غلظت اسانس).بازخورد 100 درصد مثبت.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
Acqua di parma Leather est un parfum au sens plutôt cuir citronné qu'autre chose...
il est bon certe, mais ne fais pas vraiment la différence avec ses concurrents, je trouve pas qu'il ressemble au tom ford Tuscan leather ...
sa projection est pas mal mais reste modérer
la longévité est entre 4h a 5h

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
8/11/2018

I got a sample of 9 different Acqua Di Parma fragrances and this is the first I tried. I love the original Colonia and I really like Leather too. When I first put it on it smelled great. I Initially I thought I smelled something a little like whisky but, I don't see it in the notes so its probably a combination of the leather and tree smells. Throughout the day it continued smelling great. A few hours in a could detect a nice floral smell. It wasn't strong and really added to the enjoyment of the scent.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
Colonia Leather may very well be the Goldilocks of the full-flavored leather fragrances. On one hand, I have Tuscan Leather, Golden Boy and La Yuqawam Homme that many consider too strong and too dark, while Cuir de Russie, Cuir Cannage and others may come across as being too weak or contain too many floral notes. Colonia Leather manages to strike that "just right" accord.

My issue (and imagine that I am not alone) is that I really love the strong/dark leather fragrances, but they are not something I wear often during the Spring/Summer months. That's what Colonia Leather does better than all the others...it's full-flavored leather; not too strong and not too weak; and it's a leather scent a man can wear proudly year round to include the Spring/Summer months. It is leather from top-to-bottom, with a fresh citrus opening and a bit of woods and floral (deep in the background) to keep things in check. It's that simple, and it's that elegant.

I really didn't have a "go to" full-flavored leather fragrance for this time of year until adding Colonia Leather to my Scent Armory. Sure, I could go with one-spray of Tuscan Leather, but men enjoy that scent more than women and, to me, it's extremely cloying during the warmer months. Moreover, while I enjoy light-leather frags such as Fan di Fendi Pour Homme, Vince Camuto for Men and Carolina Herrera CH Men...sometimes you just want to smell an full-flavored leather scent during the Summer months, and Acqua di Parma nailed this scent genre.

Anyway, AdP Colonia Leather is certainly worth taking a sniff if you're looking for a full-flavored warm-weather leather fragrance. It's the only one I own filling this niche category. Finally, this fragrance does not remind me of Tuscan Leather - but your mileage may vary.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
Somehow, some way, this leather fragrance manages to be versatile enough to wear anywhere. Looking at the notes, I can see why, but hats off to ADP for blending this so damn well. It's the best leather frag because it's the most wearable leather frag. A perfect example of what balance can lead to.

10/10

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
The best leather fragrance for gentlemen.

Opens fresh and crisp then will develop to a strong authentic leather note wrapped in dry rose. Very refined, very long lasting with excellent projection. Huge compliments magnet.

Better, much more elegant, smoother and classier than Tuscan Leather.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
Tom Ford's leather made in Italy. More sober, with a lower volume, comfortable and rounded.
The student who overcomes the teacher?yes,probably!
Lippi o Botticelli?The choice is yours.

For me the safest shot of the concentree line.

... tasty!

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
When I first sampled this in-store I dismissed it as a poor imitation to Tuscan Leather... However on revisiting it I was so wrong, AdP Leather is fresher, a more versatile scent than TL and dare I say it, I actually think this is better than Tuscan Leather.
Out of the Ingredient collection, this is top spot closely followed by Oud. Both are compliment getters. Masterful.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
Fragrance -Colonia Leather Acqua di Parma
Bottle from - 2016

This fragrance reminds me of a profound,enlightened and elegant gentleman who is on an important mission.
Colonia Leather is a dark yet bright,sophisticated,classy, refined,citrusy,clean and woody interpretation of leather with an astonishing touch of divine rose and with a wisper of a bit green petitgrain.
Colonia Leather has some similarities to C for Men by Clive Christian and Tuscan Leather by Tom Ford,but Colonia took a bit different approach.I would say a more elegant,less playful,more classy,more illuminated,more refined and a bit brighter approach.

Longevity - 10/10(10+ hours)
Silage/Projection - 9/10(heavy projection and silage for the first 3-4 hours)
Weather -For more or less any time of year.I personally wouldn't wear this on a really hot summer days.
Age - 27+
Compliments - 9/10
Scent - 10/10

Main notes according to me -
leather,guaiac wood,rose,orange,lime,cedar.

The drydown is woody,leathery,smoky,a bit dry,bitter and green and I get some -leather,woodiness and petitgrain.

Emotions - elegant,enlightened,sophisticated,illuminated, classy,refined,profound,timeless.

Occasion -Perfect for special occasions,life defining moments,formal and semi-formal events.

This is the scent of a true gentleman.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: This is one of the first clean smelling leathers ive ever smelled. It does have the tuscan leather vibe but this is just miles ahead in terms of classiness. TL becomes cloying while this one keeps getting better as you wear it. I think most wear TL to tell others they wear TL. This is also way more versatile. Buy a sample. Do it!

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: I own La Yuqawam and have a decant of Tuscan Leather. I tried this one to day and I prefer this over the others. It's a more authentic leather wibe I get.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: This is one of the best leather perfume I have owned. This is on a league of its own and it not at all similar to TF-TL other than leather being a common factor. This smells so fresh and clean with the leather coming through from start to finish. The longevity and silage are also very good. I didn’t find anything similar to this yet.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: its not even close to tuscan. i think its better than tuscan by the way

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
Found a super deal for this one and read some reviews before blind buying it...

Almost immediately you get the leather note to it and it's absolutely brilliant! It's very classy and sophisticated but retains its animalic factor. It doesn't really evolve much on me, begins with a blast and very slowly fades into a very warm elegant drydown.

I say very slowly because this one lasts at least 12 hours on me. Worn it a few times now,mostly to office and it really makes me feel like Da Boss! I'm not really bothered about compliments or anything as I wear this for myself but I've only heard good things thus far.

I guess these types of scents are obviously aimed at those who appreciate leather notes but I really do think that the juice is versatile and has it's own mainstream appeal. End of the day, a 100ml bottle for MYR 150 (about 38$) was to good to resistand I'm really glad I took the plunge!

Scent - 9/10 absolutely brilliant leather
Silage - 9/10 anyone coming into proximity will notice
Projection- 9/10 at least 1 foot for quite a while
Longevity - 9/10 absolute Beast!

At least that's the way I see it

At least that's the way I see it.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: This is a smooth and refined leather. Comparisons to Tuscan Leather are welcomed but this is an upscale version. Sort of like a tamed beast. Strong sillage but not overwhelming and great performance. The leather here is not as rugged which makes this much more wearable when compared to other great leather scents. This is a home run while Tuscan Leather is an off the wall double.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: The most realistic real leather in the market

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: Stop Press! Oh my goodness. Blast of smoky rose luxuriousness, buttery smooth leather and staying power that'll please many. Wonderful!

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: What do i say on this one? Rich italian leather. So great smelling. Sillage strong and very noticablw.got complimemted a lot with it. Citrus and rose notes.make it even more rich and unique. Such agreat scent!!!! Performance is wonderful. Its deep, masculine beru fashionable and for a winter special occasion like a ball or something. I really love this one. I ll give it 9/10

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
Having a sample! wanting so much to try this one!
Classiness luxiourious italian leather!
Yeah nice fragrance, after few wearing, I recognize this one is a solid scent.
First, it start with a blast of rose and citrus leather. Then the leather took slowly the place on the drydown. To my nose, it's a mix of Potion Royal black with that rose note and the leather of Tuscan Leather without the cocaine vibe of it.
Longevity is great, got 8-10 hours even for a EdC concentrée (EdT concentration if you want to be honest)
not very versatile but formal and clubbing at night.
Fall and winther because of its great projection|
Great fragrance, Try it out!

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: Stick your nose into the leather seat of a new car, same thing...

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
I see the comparison to Tuscan Leather, but ADP is far more polished. This is the leather of the shoes of an orange-eating Italian businessman, rather than the leather jacket of a cigar-smoking cocaine dealer. Not that there's anything wrong with that.
SO smooth, SO sophisticated, ADP Leather is a beautiful blend and absolutely one of the classiest and most distinguished scents I've ever laid my nose upon.

10/10

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
I’m sure that everyone has that one fragrance in their collection that they would miss if it was discontinued. For me, it’s this one. I start to miss this if I don’t wear it every once in awhile. It is by far my favorite leather fragrance. I even spray it on the inside of my leather jackets and leather travel bags because they should smell like this. This is what leather is supposed to smell like.

I’m a leather guy though. I want leather seats in my trucks and cars. I prefer leather furniture. Yeah, I got my boots on. I used to leave my saddle in the back seat of my truck/car just so I could smell the leather when I opened the door and while on the road.

Leather is one of those universal items that belongs in and also connects so many different categories. From antique to modern, from blue collar usefulness to what transforms typical in to luxury, leather is a tie that binds. It’s one of the few things that a rugged biker has in common with an eccentric tycoon, and it keeps the cowboy from being too far removed from the city slicker; give us our leather.

And leather this is. A perfect leather. If orange peel was made out of leather, this is what it would smell like. That’s the vision I have anyway.

Just like the real deal, the durability and longevity are both fantastic. Sillage is just right, others will know you’ve been there but didn’t wear out your welcome. I would wear this anywhere, at any time, except for the beach.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: Smells really like a new, leather jacket. Great. I love it. I will buy it for my husband for sure. So good!

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
This is fragrance is one of my lastest purchases, alongside with Pardon by Nasomatto (I'll get there after this first impressions review) and here's my initial thoughts.

Such a fantastic take on leather! It starts fresh, citrucy, juicy and, after the initial blast, comes a warm, classy and elegant leather note, like you were inside of a brand new Mercedes-Benz leather interior. The leather note is definitely the main character of this scent, followed with some woodiness, creaminess and a slight sweetness coming from the guaiac wood and citrus.

So far it seems to be a long lasting fragrance.

High quality and unique scent that deserves more attention.

LOVE IT!

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
Fresh leather. I never thought this combination of citrus, soap and leather could work so well but now I am hooked And its got like a oriental tea vibe. This has become my top leather fragrance. It is not animalic, dirty, smokey or synthetic. It is just... clean. Performance: it could be better, colonia oud is much stronger.

Update: To the person below me that said this is Neroli Portofino + Tuscan leather. Nailed it.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: Fantastic scent, but developed badly during storage through the last 03 years (and it was stored correctly). The smell now is cloying, annoying. Gently use your bottle until it is fresh, or throw it away in some little time...

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
This is truly exceptional, just exceptional!

The only similarities between this and Tuscan Leather are:
They are both leather scents,expensive, quality
blends and they come in brown bottles.

They don't smell the same, not even on the dry down, they are not even the same type of leather.
Never think you can substitute the one for the other, they offer different things, really. It makes perfect sense to have both, if you can!

I really love this one! AdP baby!

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: I ordered samples of this and Tuscan Leather. I prefer the Acqua di Parma. It's a bit more understated, especially after an hour or so on the dry down. It smells "expensive", without being overpowering, like TL feels to me. It's fantastic. Suitable for special occasions or nights out. I was still able to smell it on my wrist after 8 hours.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
I love this creation. It's leather with AdP signature.
Amazingly, people smelling it on me seem to love it even more than myself.
Very classy.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
The Dogs Doo Dah's....


A fantastic cold weather/formal/evening scent!

Pure quality leather with a hint of citrus, incredible longevity and sillage (2-3 sprays max).....I love this stuff!

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: Neroli Portofino+Tuscan Leather!! very classy & lovely leather scent for the warm days,save ur TF for colder nights.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
Modern cutting fragrance that we could consider as a monolithic aroma.

The opening is citrus and refreshing rather brief, the petit grain leads us straight to the agreement of leather as a main and unique note, which feels predominant from the beginning.

The facets are nice and soft, in fact, although the duration is good, it projects smoothly and without fumbling.
This leather feels somewhat sweet and with a rubbery stitch as a kind of astringent rubber, the rose is placid, soft and powdery, feels good, but nothing dominant and softens that astringent note so powerful. On the other hand, the wood of guayaco and to a lesser extent the cedar give the smoked and dry facet contributing lightness. All very well balanced.

It seems to me a smooth work, elegant, masculine and neat (very Italian). It is also a great fragrance for daytime use.

Demachy has been here excellent since it fits the aroma very well with the spirit of Acqua di Parma.

Rating: 8.5

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: It smells like my Grandfather's condo in Palm Springs... excellent (Mr. Burns voice)

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: By far the best leather scent of all time. Immensely enjoyable!

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
One word "FANTASTIC" dont be fooled by the cologne concentree this one is potent and last a very long time. I sprayed 5 heavy ones today 5 hiurs later i am still projecting like crazy and this is an honest experience. Performance wise falls into montale category despite the cologne concentree, smell wise awesome quality. Leather is the star of the show and youbwill get it, a very nice leather woody combination with a hint of freashness lurking. Overall a love for me on this one. Now to get the oud and ambra.

Side note blind buying this would not hurt at all if you are into leather smokey scents. Its not that cloying or heavy it's just right.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
هیچ ریویویی لایق این شاهکار چرمی نیست
پس بهتر که سخن کوتاه کنیم و عطر رو روی مچ دستمون اسپری کنیم تا خودش برامون حرف بزنه
10/10

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
I prefer this one far more than Tuscan leather by TF. This one smells more friendly, its not sweet, it's more elegant, and the leather smells cleaner.

It has the DNA of AdP of course, with the citruses and woods, with added notes of expensive leather.

I wish the projection and longevity were stronger though, it is weaker than TF TL.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: Fresh, clean, woodsy and oh! so smooth. The initial blast is addicting, you get punched in the nose with a beautifully blended fresh citrus, green petit grain and delicately sweet rose...WOW!...yeah...it is magic, to my nose at least. After a while the leather takes center stage as the sweetness stands down only to knit a wonderful, slightly sweet base of smooth woods and leather. From start to finish, this is a winner. 10/10

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
For me, this is far more of a straight-up leather served with a warmer feel than the comparison to Tom Ford Private Blend Tuscan Leather (although smelling reminded me that I should indulge in the latter more often).

For many, the decision point is more likely preferences:
If you want a very distinct, bold, and uncomplicated leather scent, the AdP Leather should prove very likable. For those wanting a more complex development with saffron and berry notes, Tuscan Leather would be more to your liking. Otherwise, everything you could say about longevity and sillage would be virtually identical for each.

Price, however, is a different story. Edge to the AdP for better value ounce-for-ounce. I honestly like each for what they offer individually. This is well-composed, so anyone wanting a no-nonsense leather scent, look no further.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: this is not Tuscan Leather for me neither. Tuscan Leather is more of a suede and this is proper leather. Think this is actually much better than Tuscan Leather because it has more depth, more complexity.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
too much musk, like m.kors
5/10

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: full of leather notes may make you feel sick 5/10

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: I had a chance to smell this at Neiman Marcus and I enjoyed the fresh leather so I decided to shop around and found a good deal at BeautySpin and when I received it I smelled it and did not detect the same freshness, so I guess there can be some reformulation because of the heavy leather and less freshness.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
To me this is the Son of Tuscan Leather. A beautifully balanced leather/fruit combo that results in pure masculine, addictive, gorgeous fragrance.

If you haven't smelled this yet - go find a boutique that stocks it! And if you like leather fragrances, then it's especially important that you get this under your nose.

Having used Acqua di Parma products for almost fifteen years, I feel safe in their quality control standards. I'm hoping all the batches of this that I buy over the next few years retain the same concentration of pure oils, and the same projection and longevity...

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
leather,guaiac wood and few lime and..
One of the best leather fragrances
leather scent is very natural(same bag leather)
I think it is better than Tuscan Leather Tom ford.
i prefer it to lover leathers..
The longevity is well
The projection is good
This product is appropriate for cold weather.
It is a good perfume for males.
It really smells awesome.
thx di parma
سبک کار چرمی با تمام خصوصیات
یه چرم تلخ و خشک میتونم منظورمو بگم چرم طبیعی
که تو هر عطری نمیتونید این وضوح رو پیدا کنید
چونکه بیشتر کارهای چرمی از نوع ترکیبی هستند
ولی دی پارما لدر الفبای شناسایی رایحه چرمه برا اونهایی که میخوان بدونن نت چرم یعنی چی
حتما سمت تستتش برید
نمیگم حتما واجبه بخریدش ولی بیشک پرفروشترین عطر برند دی پارماست
همیشه به کسانی که میخوان قبل تیت بدونن و کنجکاون که چه عطریه
میگم رایحه همچون بوی کیف چرمی

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
در کلاس توسکان لدر و عود لدر بدون شیرینی تمشک و زعفران
-----------
Scent & Quality: 9/10
Longevity: 9/10
Silage: 10/10
Creativity & Uniqueness: 7/10
Affordability: 4/10
-----------
Overall: 7.8/10

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
The second perfume from Ingredient Collection after Ambra that attracted my attention. After a short wearing causes an effect similar to a brain explosion! In disclosure heard the old leather belt, tarpaulin boots, tobacco, very smoky oud and, as a result - a dark corner of a horse stall. Sometimes even ammonia. And (oh my God!) - in this odd but subtle scent blossomed rose... Dark, velvety and tart! Citrus? ... What are you talking about?! ... Everyone need to try it!

In the description of the bottle in the top notes among other things indicated Sicilian lemon and raspberry, in the heart - the oil of red thyme and honeysuckle, in the base - oil of guaiac wood.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
Molto particolare. Intenso e persistente, molto maschile, dominato ovviamente dal cuoio (che però trovo un po' troppo sintetico). Buono ma, per il costo, poteva e doveva essere meglio.

Voto personale: 8/10

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: THIS IS INTOXICATING! soft, clean leather, manly and alluring. The opening is freak'in BEAUTIFUL! This is a FANTASTIC fragrance..

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée by Acqua di Parma had been on my "want list" for a few months. To me, this scent is waaaaay better than Tuscan Leather. That's just my skin opinion, ok? With the top notes of Brazilian orange, Sicilian lime, the heart notes of rose and petit grain from Paraguay, then base notes of leather, Atlas cedar and guaiac wood from Paraguay, this scent makes me happy, comfortable, and artistic. It's like a calming drug, too. I can't sense the lime or orange in the opening, but everything is so very well blended and strongly reminds me of my old soft and worn out leather jacket with the faint smell of the array of perfume throughout the years still present. It does have a nice depth to it, not as dry as Tuscan Leather, but warm and dewy, in a comforting way. This is another of those true unisex fragrances that can easily go both ways. Longevity is about 6 hours and sillage low to medium.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
It is natural to compare this to Tuscan Leather - being what is considered by many to be the quintessential leather fragrance.

I consider the leather note in this fragrance to be indistinguishable from Tom Ford. However, that is where the similarities end. TFTL, by comparison, is a sweeter scent - like a spoonful of honey is viscous and sweet on the tongue, TL is like that on the nose.

This ADP does not share that sweet, sticky texture. It is a drier feel - like might be expected from a fragrance with a strong tobacco note. However, if you are as partial to leather in a fragrance as I am, then this is no less intoxicating.

I get only the faintest whiff of the woods when not trying to pick them, and hardly any citrus (despite some differing reviews - perhaps a failure on my part). I do seek out the leather in this though, so the rest may be purely atmosphere to my brain.

I would also consider this to be a good example of how TFTL is a unisex fragrance (which took me some time to accept). It is far clearer when compared to a drier leather like this one.

For any men considering TFTL but unsure about the price tag - this is definitely something to consider. It is not especially cheap, but it is, by comparison, cheaper.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
A classy dark leather based fragrance.
This is one of my favorite leather based fragrances. it opens up with zesty citrus with the dark genuine smelling leather very noticeable from the start. it has the most genuine smelling leather out there. its not a fresh fragrance by any means. it is a dark classy fragrance that is suited for mature people. performance is very good (12+ hours).

Rating 8.0/10

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: Smell of burned plastic. Sad fragrance. Not natural or elegant. 5/10

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
God knows why 20+ people agree that this smells like Tuscan Leather.
They are TOTALLY DIFFERENT STUFF !!!

Colonia Leather has a very strange sour smell, maybe it was because of the citrus note maybe not, but Tuscan Leather certainly does not have this weird smell, Tuscan Leather mainly combined suede note with a light normal leather note and has a quite powdary and velvet touch, while the leather note in Colonia Leather is only sour and bitter.It made me feel very uncomfortable.

Even though I adore many fragrances from Acqua di Parma especially the Blu Mediterraneo collection, this time I shall mercilessly give Colonia Leather a big thumbs-down >:(

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
This is a wonderful leather scent ,the leather here is so genuine, smell expensive . If you are looking for leather based scent that is versatile and you can wear all year round and smell luxurious go for this one , projection is good and longevity is very good.
Rate overall : 10/10

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
It is true that it has the same leather accord like in Tuscan Leather but to my mind this scent is much more sophisticated and grown up.

The fruits are pretty tame and the woods amplify the basenotes.

Top leather scent indeed!

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
ذیرش این عطر بستگی به انتظار شما از بوی یک عطر چرمی دارد
چرم را همیشه با دید یک کالای غنی و فاخر میبینیم . پس انتظاری که از بوی ان میرود باید حس بوی ثروتمند باشد
متاسفانه اکوا د پارما چرم را به سلاخی کشیده است ، انتظاری که از چرم دارم اینجا خیلی کم شاههد ان هستم
بوی شاد و سرحال اوری که حجابی نازیبا بر روح چرم است
چرم در اینجا بوی غالب و قوی دارد اما در عین حال اثار امیرش ان با مرکبات تا اخر عطر ادامه دارد که نکته منفی ان همین جا است یعنی ترکیب ان با مرکبات
بوی برگ مرکبات هم بالعکس رای کاربران بسیار برجسته هست
که بوی سبز و تازه ان در عطر مشهود هست
انتظاری که از چرم دارم این هست که در پس خود رایحه هایی باشد که خللی در روح یک نت ثروتنمدی چون چرم نداشته باشد
فکر نکنم برای طرفداران چرم چیزی تازه و درخوری نسبت به تاسکان لدر باشد
ارامیس چرمی را به این ترجیح میدهم
جوان خام ثروتمند ایتالیایی
2/5
حذف نظراتی که باب میلشان نیست . این هم برای بار دوم حذف میکنند
It's not my ideal leather ، leather should not be happy ،
Leather must be Scout of smell rich and Heavy and arrogant smell
Leather is here happy and sappy ، Since amalgamation with citrus And lost a sense of rich leather
smell happy and leather = Combining the unworthy
Raw young wealthy Italian
2/5

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
This doesn't smell nothing like TF tuscan leather... they are two completely different scents... ADP leather shares more similarities to ADP oud in my opinion.

I own all 3 and to be honest I prefer ADP leather over TF tuscan leather its way better definitely a higher quality... with good performance...

This is my absolute favourite leather based scent have sampled many if you want quality look no further...

Definitely recommend to sample this fragrance.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
A very feminine, simple and linear fragrance. You would be better served by a can of Impulse.

It smells like you're walking between the handbags and perfume counter in a department store.

Initial application gives white musk type flowery notes, citrus and leather. This is how it stays until the leather and citrus disappears a couple of hours later leaving only the flowery skin scent.

Uncomplicated, uninspiring and generic. I don't understand any comparisons to Colonia Intensa Oud as they are completely different animals.

Hard to say anything positive about this except the leather smells realistic whilst it lasts.

I don't want my woman to smell like this and I definitely do not want to smell like this.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
One time at the movies some years ago, I had to lean against my mother. She thought it was that I was fond of her, but the lady next to me had a horrible, horrible scent. Colonia Leather takes me back to that same spot. I even wore it to the cinema once to see if I could shake off my demons, but no. Awful.

On a brighter note, the movies were really good!

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
1. I was relieved to find it dissimilar to Tuscan Leather (maybe after 4 hrs, or on paper).
2. I don't know if I can call this "citrus" at any point; it's like a lemon/lime without the zesty freshness nor the fruity sweetness, while not so bitter either... What is that?
3. It's actually quite smokey! Based on the notes listed I can only assume it's the guaiac wood, since there's no tobacco or incense.

Overall it's pretty well rounded; no sharp edge but not boring, easy to wear in most occasions, masculine and even dark and sexy (yet slightly refreshing); better than Tuscan Leather and its clones

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: I really was prepared to love, and at least like this and TF's 'leather' fragrance. I found both overrated, to say the very least. This is but a fruitier version of the TF. I love the smell of leather, all varieties of hides, and that's why I blind bought these. I appears lots of folks like these, but I wouldn't ever call these leather. I'm fetishy about leather, religious even. This stuff is candy store. Shalimar is more rugged than this fluid.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
Colonia Leather is the second chronologically of the Acqua di Parma concentree line, and the second I've tried, and is a very strong leather entry in the limited world of leather fragrances that I've sampled.

Comparisons to Tom Ford Tuscan Leather are more than appropriate, given the pairing of a traditional leather smell and the Colonia smell of citrus (I even get some neroli, though it is not listed in the note breakdown).

Colonia Leather is more citrus, Tuscan Leather is more of a varied fruity smell (i.e. berries), but Colonia Leather still has some sweetness of its own. It's worth to try both to compare, though admittedly, Colonia Leather is about half the price ($166 for 100ml on FragranceNet vs. about $300 for 100ml TL through most retail). Surely that comes down to price.

I'd argue that Colonia Leather might be redundant enough with Coach Leatherware No. 3, which is now discontinued but I managed to locate a couple of months ago, as even Leatherware No. 3 is a similar essential expression of leather with some citrus and woody aspects.

Performance-wise, it's certainly stronger than most Acqua di Parma offerings, both from the Colonia and Blu lines, and is probably the strongest I've tried in terms of both projection and longevity, on par with Colonia Ambra (I still need to try Colonia Oud). However, Colonia Leather isn't as strong as Tuscan Leather, and in that respect is a little easier to wear on a year-round basis.

Very strong, versatile leather fragrance. Highly and frequently wearable but also refined enough to dress up and keep as a fragrance for special occasions. I highly recommend trying this out, as despite lacking the Tuscan Leather reputation, I imagine that many will find this better.

8 out 10

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
This is wonderful, absolutely gorgeous, the best leather based fragrance that you can also wear in the summer, Colonia Leather is a very authentic leather blended with citrus to perfection. A fragrance with attitude and character and a very sexy fragrance.
A masterpiece from Demachy.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: Smells incredibly like real quality leather. It is warm and elegant.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
This is everything I was looking for in tuscan leather. It is just a stunningly beautiful fragrance.

I get this beautiful, smooth leather handbag at the opening. Whereas this is smooth and creamy, tuscan leather is harsh and brash! Not saying I dislike TL, i just find it too abrasive. This is softened by a citrus blend that takes it down a path that differs completely from Tuscan leather.

Then, the most interesting thing happens with this frag. When it starts to dry down I get his bubblegum feel to it? I have heard of a fragrance called bubblegum chic, I used to go wtf? Who would make a bubblegum fragrance and call it luxury?

Well this perfume's drydown makes me understand that bubblegum accord in a truly luxurious way! it is bizarre but rather beautiful! This is a masterpiece!

10/10 terrific stuff!

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: ADP Colonia Leather is a clean, soft leather. Mostly Citrus and leather notes with Guaiac wood. Projection is a bit on the softer side but then ADP frags arent meant for Montale type projection. Longevity is really good,around the 7-8 hour mark on me which is fine since I mostly use this for formal events in the night. Goes great with a dark suit and tie. Slightly on the expensive side but worth it in my book. You need a lighter leather like this in your wardrobe for the days and occasions when Tuscan leather, Godolphin, or La Yuqawam might be too heavy. Wonderful leather fragrance. recommended. 8.5/10

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
If you like clean leather ....this is astonishing! I always wondered what some members meant when they referred to a fragrance as clean leather.Get your nose on this stuff, you will understand.For clean leather lovers, this is it!

Personally though, as much as am in awe of this stuff, I think i prefer the smoky somewhat animalic pungency of especially La yuqawam and maybe T.F Tuskan leather.
This would definitely satisfy the gentleman in me, every now and then.I like the opening better than the dry down.

Without the need to waste any more words..simply put
MASTERPIECE!!!

Shout out to edge42...thank you mate :)

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: One of the realest leather accords out there.. Still has the fresh DNA by which AdP is known for and because of this Colonia Leather is much easier to wear.. Performance is awesome! Longevity, projection and sillage are above average! A real keeper!

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
Simple.......if you like the genre that follows the Tom Ford Tuscan Leather vein you won't be
Disappointed. This stuff smells phenomenal and projects non stop for hours. Great juice. ADP salute!

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
(THIS REVIEW WAS PENNED A WHILE AGO WHEN THIS CAME OUT.)

I've Been waiting to try this for ages! Took so long for stores to get it that I actually stopped looking and forgot about it to an extent.
The reason I was anticipating this so much was due to my love of leather fragrances and my hope that this would be the holy grail...and is it?
Well, sort of? It is and it isn't...
Reason being the opening was stunning, really great, rich, opulent almost dark, slightly smoky leather. When I say 'leather' I do mean an accurate and stunning leather note.
So far so good you might think and you'd be right it's worthy of praise but then starts to change into familiar territory.
By this I'm talking TF Tuscan leather and Clive Christian C complete with raspberry note and all...again not a criticism, C is one of my absolute favourite fragrances and I've extensively tested Tuscan leather (which I controversially said is not as good) so I like to think I know what I'm talking about here.
In fact I think this is less complex than C more toward Tuscan leather but still very complex and different to both in the most subtle way. It tightropes between smelling like an accurate leather, maybe even a hint of citrus, something slightly more soapy and cleaner then back to CC C/TF TL.
Now I have Oud concentree and that has epic longevity and obnoxious silage on my skin, almost to the point of it being too much even for me to wear and I was expecting the same from this juice.
Don't get me wrong here the performance of this juice is very good and way, way up there. Silage and trail are pretty massive for the first few hours but doesn't quite have the godlike longevity status of Clive Christian C....nor is it as heady and complex, magical or even 'harsh' for want of a better word.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: Oh man...this is one of those scents that hits my olfactory system just right and renders me stupid with pleasure; the pleasure I derive from this scent feels almost criminal. That's my subjective experience. More objectively, this stuff smells like leather, delivered to the nose with a texture that's somehow both tart and velvety. It shares a lot of similarities to Tuscan Leather, but lacks TL's histrionics. TL smells really, really good; Colonia Leather makes me rapturous and weak in the knees. I'll certainly buy a bottle when I finish school. I just wish it came in 50ml instead of only in giant bottles.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: Pure leather ecstasy. You can sit in it like a comfortable and luxurious chair. You can wear it like a supple and elegant glove. You can find woody depths and citrusy peaks. You can't wear it just once. Perfect, perfect perfection. Glorious. Stopped me in my tracks and made me grab the shelf to keep my balance.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: This is Sexy ! Once its settled, leather notes take over and work the magic. Its not too heavy or cloying. Projection is just fine,( About 2 meter on my skin). Subtle, refined and rich.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
Yes, it's comparable to Tuscan Leather, however, the leather presented here has that unmistakable citrus background of all the AdP fragrances.

I prefer the class and timelessness of this one To TL.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
Many have compared this is TFs Tuscan Leather. Both are quite different. This is actually wearable in both the heat and cool weather whilst Tuscan Leather is too intense to pull off in any warm climates imho.

Plus Tuscan Leather is predominantly berry leather whilst this is more of a gentle leather with circus on the opening and then solely leather by the dry down.

I prefer it to Tuscan Leather. Silliage is above average and longevity is about 8 hrs on my skin.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: Keep up the good work.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: Tried this today at a small profumeria in Montalcino. The Guaiac wood is the most prominent note to me, the leather comes in at the dry down but this is a very resinous dark wood with leather in the back. I prefer Tuscan Leather more for a leather scent. The problem is the ash tray smell as people have been describing, it's quite unsavory. I'll pass.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content: This is a gorgeous, authentic leather scent and a damn clever thing apart from one minor annoyance. As someone else has mentioned here, there comes a point when you notice the unmistakable note of ashtray and once you smell it, it won't go away! However, I found that layering a light spritz of Versace's Oud Noir seems to soften that ashtray while adding a little oriental mystique. A very expensive but divinely hedonistic combo!

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
Beautiful!

But tricky sillage. I find that it stays VERY close to the skin in cooler temperatures. When my skin warms up, the scent comes back. A bit softer than I'd like it to be.

Some people have compared this to Tom Ford's Tuscan Leather, and I can see why. There is definitely a similarity here, but a little toned down. I also find it sharing similarities with La Yuqawam Homme. But Colonia Leather is on a slightly higher level. Just a bit more character and certainly a MUCH finer presentation. Colonia Leather comes in an exquisite satin lined box with faux hinged lid, and the bottle itself exudes luxury. More so than Tom Ford, IMHO.

I'm not in a hurry to buy a full bottle of this, though. I'll have to live with it for a while longer, but for the time being Yuqawam Homme has enough of the same accord to keep me satisfied.

product_name: Colonia Leather Eau de Cologne Concentrée Acqua di Parma
review_content:
